ProductInfo.Features:
1/4" OV7930 CMOS Wireless Security Camera; Weatherproof (Indoor/Outdoor)
Night Vision up to 26 feet (with 11PCS Infrared LEDs); Clear Color Image (380 TV Line Resolution)
Wireless Receiver Supports up to 4 Cameras; Built-in Microphone. (One Way Audio)
Cameras have Switchable Channels; Easy Installation: Just Connect to Your TV or DVR
Wireless 2.4GHz Transmission between Camera & Receiver up to 100m (326ft) in Open Space
ProductInfo.Name: Brand New Kare L0108W4 Infrared Leds 2 Weatherproof Indoor/ Outdoor Wireless CCTV Security Camera System 4CH Receiver 8M Ir 100m Transmission
